CosmereScadrial.Defs.AllomanticAbilityDe.label: Steel Aura
CosmereScadrial.Defs.AllomanticAbilityDe.description: Reveals nearby sources of metal by tracing fine blue lines through the air. Each line points toward a metal object — coin, armor, blade — waiting to be pushed. These lines shimmer with the tension of potential force, visible only to those burning Steel.

CosmereScadrial.Defs.AllomanticAbilityDe.label: Steel Push
CosmereScadrial.Defs.AllomanticAbilityDe.description: By burning steel, the Allomancer projects invisible lines of force toward nearby sources of metal, pushing against them with immense power. A skilled practitioner can hurl weapons from foes’ hands, send enemies tumbling, or launch themselves through the air when braced properly.
